use_case: Complete business automation for medical supplies businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Medical Supplies business owners, industrial & b2b professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for medical supplies businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the medical supplies industry.
key_benefits: Industry-specific funnels for medical supplies services
Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Medical Supplies businesses wanting to automate operations
New medical supplies businesses needing a complete system
Established industrial & b2b companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Medical Supplies Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Medical Supplies Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
